headline.main: HID HIS KNOWLEDGE TO SPY, JURY HEARS; Heine, Former Auto Executive Abroad, Posed Here as Tyro in Aviation, Witnesses Say BUT GAVE DATA TO NAZIS Letter Quoted to Show He Was Specialist at Time He Was Seeking Instruction

lead_paragraph: Edmund Carl Heine, suave, glibtongued former foreign manager for the Ford and Chrysler Motor Companies, was pictured yesterday by government witnesses as a professed tyro in aviation, who employed his alleged ignorance about airplanes to advantage in uncovering and transmitting to Germany vital information about American plane manufacture and production.
abstract: Sebold and other witnesses testify on Heine's attempts to transmit aircraft data through decoy station
snippet: Edmund Carl Heine, suave, glibtongued former foreign manager for the Ford and Chrysler Motor Companies, was pictured yesterday by government witnesses as a professed tyro in aviation, who employed his alleged ignorance about airplanes to advantage...
